request.description: Retrieve a user by their unique identifier.
Update the details of an existing user.
Delete a user by its ID.
Verifies the user's email with the provided verification code.
Send a reset password email to the user.
Reset the user's password using the reset code.
Login for the user.
Retrieve a paginated list of all users.

response.name: Successfully retrieved the list of users.

request.description: Creates a new user and sends a verification code to the email.
